Class DefaultRepositoryStorage

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RepositoryStorage, ResourceStore

    public class DefaultRepositoryStorage
extends AbstractRepositoryStorage
    A simple RepositoryStorage that uses the local file system.
    Since:
    16-Jan-2012
    Author:
    thomas.diesler@jboss.com
